name: Life in Progress
description:
Life in Progress

Gamify your student life with this Life in Progress planner!

- keep track of how you are feeling every day 😀

- manage your to do list with a progress bar ✅ 

- a handy dandy pomodoro timer 🍅 for your study time 

- take a moment to breathe

- collect affirmation stickers as you explore the game over time

- everything you share with your Life in Progress Journal is completely private - for your eyes only 👀 

- also available for your mobile devices (coming soon)

- you can also get IRL versions of the affirmation stickers (redbubble store)

...

This game was co-created for RMIT's Creative Wellbeing Festival. We hope this game brings you joy! However, this artwork is not designed to provide art therapy, psychology or counselling treatment. 

Here are some supports available to you: 

 RMIT Student Support: 

https://www.rmit.edu.au/students/support-and-facilities/student-support/counselling 

RMIT Urgent Crisis Support (after hour call): 1300 305 737 

RMIT after hour text: 0488 884 162 

Other Mental Health Support: 

 Lifeline: 13 11 14  

 Beyond Blue: 1300 22 4636 1800 

Respect: 1800 737 732
